name: Lewisham
pianoShortLocation: ALewisham train station has a piano
description: Lewisham train station has a piano.

name: Abbey Wood
pianoShortLocation: Abbey Wood train station has a piano
description: Abbey Wood train station has a piano. The piano is sometimes up in the main station, other times at the Lizzie Line exit.

name: Wuppertal Hauptbahnhof
pianoShortLocation: Wuppertal train station has a piano as of April 2024
description: VWuppertal train station has a piano as of April 2024. The pedal on the piano is broken.

name: Niagra Falls
pianoShortLocation: VIA Rail (CA) has a piano in the Niagra Falls, ON station as of February 2023
description: VIA Rail (CA) has a piano in the Niagra Falls, ON station as of February 2023

name: Glasgow Queen Street
description: Glasgow Queen Street has a piano, but no location within the station has been provided. If you see the piano, let us know so we can update this website!

name: Brighton
description: Brighton train station has a piano near the ticket gates. The piano is locked in the morning. The piano is not in a good condition, but is playable.

name: Edinburgh Waverley
description: Edinburgh Waverley train station has a piano near platform 2. The piano is playable at any time of day.
